name: Crossed Paths
description:
Created for Pygame Jam November 2020. 

A puzzle game, with some cute adventure elements, characters and story.
Yaya needs to get home, but gets diverted on the way. By some twist of fate, her path crosses with Zaza, her twin from a parallel dimension. Now they need to work together to get to safety.

Requires Python 3 and PyGame library.

Design and Coding: kwikrick (Rick van der Meiden)

Graphics & Music: copied or derived from free internet resources by various other; see licence file for details.
